description: Prana's bestselling Journeyman collection now has a hoodie added to the mix. And, as expected, this one is as lighthearted as the rest of the Journeyman designs. But of course, fun graphics aren't all this hoodie has to offer. It's delightfully soft, sustainable, and made in a Fair Trade Certified™ Factory too. Which makes it perfect for, well, journeys, and great for the planet too.
name: Prana Journeyman Hoodie - Mens
